item.title: The Airplane That Refuses to Quit!
item.description: A look back at the disappearance of Sarah Payne, whose tragic case in the UK led to lasting changes in child protection laws.

media:content.media:title: The Airplane That Refuses to Quit!
media:content.media:description: A look back at the disappearance of Sarah Payne, whose tragic case in the UK led to lasting changes in child protection laws.

item.title: I Got Scammed Out of $41,000 On NASA Jet!
item.description: A costly lesson unfolds after a $41,000 deal for a NASA jet turns out to be a scam — revealing how easily passion projects can go wrong.

item.title: Discovery Inside a 37-Year Abandoned Airplane
item.description: While exploring a plane left untouched for nearly four decades, an unexpected discovery brings the aircraft’s long-forgotten story back to life.

item.title: Restoring a Flying Boat After 8 Years
item.description: A long-abandoned flying boat gets a new chance at life as it’s inspected, cleaned, and prepared for restoration after more than eight years of sitting idle.

item.title: Restoring the 1947 Cessna 120
item.description: A project years in the making — rebuilding a 1947 Cessna 120 and the challenges that come with bringing history back to life.

item.title: Diesel Truck or Private Jet for $75K
item.description: Faced with a big decision — a diesel truck or a private jet for the same price? Here’s how the choice plays out.

item.title: Cheapest 421 Stranded Me!
item.description: What happens when flying the most affordable 421 doesn’t go as planned? A look at lessons learned from an unexpected landing

item.title: Next Steps: Piper Aztec Restoration
item.description: Follow the ongoing restoration of the classic Piper Aztec as it moves closer to returning to the skies.

item.title: Ranking the Best: 7 Fighter Jets Available for Civilian Ownership!
item.description: From vintage icons to modern marvels, here are seven fighter jets that private owners can legally buy and fly. A fascinating look into aviation’s elite collectibles.

item.title: Record-Setting Aircraft: Inside the Flight
item.description: A factual look at an aircraft known for breaking performance records exploring the design, pilots, and confirmed flight achievements.

item.title: Reviving Buzz Aldrin’s Long-Abandoned Jet
item.description: We take on the challenge of inspecting and attempting to start Buzz Aldrin’s private jet, left unused for years.

item.title: Airplane Auction Surprise Deal
item.description: A bidder scores an unexpected win at an aircraft auction, taking home a plane for $17,500 — a deal that turns heads in the hangar.

item.title: Restoring a MIG 15 Jet
item.description: An abandoned MIG 15 returns to the skies after 12 years of rest.

item.title: Bringing an Electric Car Back
item.description: The process of recovering and transporting an abandoned electric vehicle.

item.title: Starting an Airplane After 30 Years
item.description: Watch the attempt to bring a long-parked airplane back to life after three decades.

item.title: Engine Modification Madness!
item.description: A closer look at bold engine modifications and what they can deliver.

item.title: Airplane Auction Surprise
item.description: An aircraft auction takes an unexpected turn with a $17,500 find.

item.title: Restoring a WW1 Plane
item.description: Beginning the journey of bringing a World War I plane back to life.

item.title: Don't Leave Without This
item.description: Highlighting an essential item you shouldn’t head out without.

item.title: Cheapest 421 AC Repair
item.description: A budget-friendly approach to repairing air conditioning on the 421.
